Hi,

in his dissertation, Roy explicitly cites the "Timeless way of building" and
applies this approach of design in the fifth chapter. I was wondering if any
of you encountered other examples of this approach in software architecture?

Thanks a lot,
Benoit.

--0016363b8b6c405bae048d2a4d01
